name: Airship Simulator
description:
More of a prototype/experiment than anything, made for my D&D campaign where my players have to frantically fly an airship (for the first time) into a storm.

Left click controls (their dark wood bases) to select them, then use WS or AD to control them!
Levers result in a constant value change while the spinny knobs only change the value when they're moving. You can use them for more precise value changes.

1-4 on the keyboard will apply different "winds" that move the ship in different ways. See if you can stabilize it in all 4!

0 will reset all wind forces, and 7 will reset all values, sorta a reset button
